title: Content Telemetry Web Element

repo:id.title: Element Id
repo:id.description: The unique ID of the web element.

repo:lastModifiedDate.description: The server date and time when the resource was last modified in the repository, such as when a new version of an asset is uploaded or a directory's child resource is added or removed. The date time property should conform to ISO 8601 standard. An example form is "2004-10-23T12:00:00-06:00".

xdm:elementType.title: Element Type
xdm:elementType.description: The type of the element's component.

dc:title.title: Title
dc:title.description: The title of the web element

xdm:language.description: Specifies the language of this web element. the language property should conform to BPC 47, for example `en-GB`.

xdm:asset.title: Asset
xdm:asset.description: The asset referred by the web element.

xdm:linkUrl.title: LinkUrl
xdm:linkUrl.description: The URL the element links to.

xmp:keywords.title: Keywords

items.title: Keyword
items.description: The `Keyword` schema describes a keyword in a list of keywords, with specific locale and importance relative to other keywords in the same list.

value.title: Value
value.description: The keyword itself. A keyword can be considered like a tag, i.e. a short description of the content of the asset.

localeCode.description: Language of the keyword. The locale code should follow [RFC BCP 47](https://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

importance.title: Importance
importance.description: The importance of the keyword on a scale from zero to one. If required repository will infer it as per its policies and add it for the keywords

xmp:keywords.description: The `keywords` property is used to track human-assigned descriptive phrases like keywords or tags of an asset. Rather than a plan list of tags, it is a structured set of keywords, where keywords can have an explicit importance ranking and a locale. This allows the management of multi-lingual keywords for a given asset. For machine-generated keywords, use the `machineKeywords` property.

repo:parentId.title: Parent ID
repo:parentId.description: The repo:id of the parent webelement.

xdm:shownItems.title: Shown item IDs
xdm:shownItems.description: The IDs of shown items on containers like accordion or carousel
